Institution Name: FEDERAL COLLEGE OF DENTAL TECH. AND THERAPY, ENUGU, (AFFL TO FUTO), ENUGU STATE
Direct Entry Requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Chemistry and any one of Physics, Biology/ Zoology/Botany and Mathematics.
UTME Requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and Biology.

Institution Name: FEDERAL COLLEGE OF DENTAL TECH. AND THERAPY, ENUGU, (AFFL TO FUTO), ENUGU STATE
Direct Entry Requirements: Three (3) 'A' Level passes to include Chemistry, Biology/Zoology and Physics.
UTME Requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Physics, Chemistry, Biology and Mathematics.
Subjects: Chemistry, Biology and one (1) other Science subject.

Institution Name: FEDERAL COLLEGE OF DENTAL TECH. AND THERAPY, ENUGU, (AFFL TO FUTO), ENUGU STATE
Direct Entry Requirements:
(i)              'A' Level passes in any two (2) of Physics, Chemistry, Biology and Mathematics

(ii)          ND Upper Credit in Prosthesis and Orthopaedic Technology.
UTME Requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including English Language, Physics, Mathematics, Chemistry and Biology.

Institution Name: FEDERAL COLLEGE OF DENTAL TECH. AND THERAPY, ENUGU, (AFFL TO FUTO), ENUGU STATE
Direct Entry Requirements:
(i)              Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Biology/ Zoology, Chemistry and Physics plus  three (3) other 'O' Level credit passes in Mathematics, Physics and English Language.

(ii)            NRN or its approved equivalent plus five (5) 'O' Level credit passes  in English Language and four (4) Science subjects chosen from Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry, Biology, Human Anatomy, Physiology and Hygiene, Health Science, Further Mathematics and General Science.
UTME Requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics, Chemistry, Biology, Physics and English Language.
